{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04166v1", "title": "An Equidistribution Result for Differences Associated to Square
  Pyramidal Numbers II", "summary": "This paper presents some new results concerned with uniform distribution
properties associated with the sequence $(a_n)_{n\in\mathbb{N}}$, which is
defined as the distance from the $n$-th square pyramidal number to the closest
square. We also extend the results to arithmetic progressions.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-05-07T06:35:28Z"}
